message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which has been meticulously designed to meet the highest standards of quality and performance. We believe it could be an excellent fit for your needs. Considering its exceptional features and benefits, we're offering it to you at a special introductory price of $18000. This is a limited-time offer, so please let us know if you're interested in discussing further.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $12000. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?

Thank you for your interest in our product, Bob. I appreciate your feedback and am willing to discuss further. Considering the value and unique features of this product, I would like to propose a counteroffer of $16000. This price still reflects the high quality and value we believe the product offers, while accommodating your budget considerations.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. I'm still interested in the product, but I need to be within my budget of $8000. Would you be willing to meet me at $10000?

Thank you for your continued interest, Bob. I understand your budget constraints and am willing to compromise. I would like to propose a counteroffer of $12000 for the product. This price still reflects the value and quality of the product, while being more accessible to your current financial situation.
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, Alice. I'm still interested in the product, but I really need to stay within my budget of $8000. Would you be willing to sell it to me for $8000?

Thank you for your persistence, Bob. I understand your budgetary concerns and am willing to meet you halfway. I propose a counteroffer of $9000 for the product. This price reflects the value of the product while being more accommodating to your financial situation.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, Alice. I'm still interested in the product, but I'm not sure if $9000 is the best fit for me. Would you be willing to sell it to me for $8500?

Thank you for your continued interest, Bob. I appreciate your effort to find a mutually agreeable price. After careful consideration, I am willing to offer the product to you for $8800. This price reflects the value of the product while being responsive to your budgetary considerations.
